Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: News report that the Treasurer Jim Chalmers is returning from the US after discussing economic strategies with next month's federal budget due shortly. Chalmers has announced that cost of living relief will be prioritised - but everyone's keeping their eyes peeled for specifics. In other news a new report from the AMA has shown that it's getting harder to access bulk-billed GP services leading to rising out-of-pocket expenses. The AMA is pressing the Federal Government to come up with urgent funding.
